column1: Poverty for Individuals in Chicago Community Areas
Source: 1970-2000 data are tabulated from the Decennial Census, 2008-2012 data are tabulated from the American Community Survey

Note: Data for some census tracts are suppressed (i.e., not reported) by the Census Bureau. This affects only some community areas but has the effect of causing the community area data to not sum exactly to the citywide total.
Note: For 1970 data, most of the unassigned were for CA 76 O'Hare; Note also: poverty data are not available prior to 1970.
